sentences.en: A litter of notes, papers, and textbooks were strewn on the desk.
sentences.cn: 一堆笔记、考卷和课本乱七八糟地摊在桌子上。

sentences.en: a litter of puppies
sentences.cn: 一窝小狗

sentences.en: a town with a litter problem
sentences.cn: 存在乱扔垃圾问题的一个小镇

sentences.en: Animals reject the runt of the litter.
sentences.cn: 动物会丢弃最弱小的幼仔。

sentences.en: Clothes littered the floor.
sentences.cn: 衣服扔了一地。

sentences.en: Don't litter the ground with paper.
sentences.cn: 勿随地乱扔纸屑.

sentences.en: Don't litter the place with wastepaper.
sentences.cn: 不要乱扔废纸.

sentences.en: Don't litter up the floor with scraps of paper.
sentences.cn: 不要在地板上乱扔纸屑.

sentences.en: He pushed aside the litter of books and papers and laid two places at the table.
sentences.cn: 他把桌子上凌乱堆放着的书本和报纸推开，摆了两套餐具。

sentences.en: Her desk was covered in a litter of books and papers.
sentences.cn: 她的书桌上都是乱七八糟的书和纸.

sentences.en: Her room was in such a litter that she was ashamed to ask me in.
sentences.cn: 她的房间十分凌乱,所以不好意思请我进去.

sentences.en: I hate people who litter in the forest.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌那些在森林里乱扔垃圾的人。

sentences.en: If you see litter in the corridor, pick it up.
sentences.cn: 如果你看到走廊里有垃圾，就把它捡起来。

sentences.en: It is antisocial to leave one's litter in public place.
sentences.cn: 在公共场所遗弃杂物是妨害公共利益的.

sentences.en: Litter in the hen coop beds down if it is not raked.
sentences.cn: 鸡笼里的稻草如不清除会形成硬层.

sentences.en: People who drop litter can be fined in some cities.
sentences.cn: 在有些城市，乱扔垃圾的人会被罚款。

sentences.en: People who litter often have no pride in the area.
sentences.cn: 经常随地乱扔垃圾的人没有地区荣誉感。

sentences.en: Soil animals increase the speed of litter breakdown by disintegrating tissue.
sentences.cn: 土壤动物通过分解组织,加速落叶层降解的速度.

sentences.en: The floor was littered with papers.
sentences.cn: 地板上乱七八糟扔了许多报纸。

sentences.en: the runt of the litter
sentences.cn: 最弱小的幼崽

sentences.en: The streets were full of litter.
sentences.cn: 街道上满是乱扔的废纸.

sentences.en: Wear rubber gloves when handling cat litter.
sentences.cn: 清理猫粪时要带上橡胶手套。

sentences.en: Why do you always litter up the table with all these newspapers?
sentences.cn: 你为什么总是将报纸乱丢,把桌子弄得乱糟糟 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 在街道或公共场所乱丢垃圾的人

trans.tran_cn: 废弃物，垃圾，杂乱的一堆，一窝幼崽，猫砂，褥草，轿子
trans.tran_en: waste paper, cans etc that people have thrown away and left on the ground in a public place
to leave waste paper, cans etc on the ground in a public place
to leave waste paper, cans etc on the ground in a public place
to leave waste paper, cans etc on the ground in a public place
